name: Fast in Still Castle
description:
A 3D Sidescrolling Action Bullethell Light Game About Avoid Obstacles Gaining Speed And Losing Control as You Try to Escape Your Pursuer.

Can You Manage to Escape? if so How Fast? and how many Deaths? tell us below :)!

Controls:

A & DMove Left And Right Respectively

SpaceJump

Hold Left Mouse Click

Transform & Fly

EscPause Menu

~ The Team ~

Edo Amit - Level Design & Game Design

David Anderson - Programming & Art

Hope you Like the Game, Tell us What you Thought!
